com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.game

Interface Game

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Tickable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGame, CustomGame, EditModeGame

    public interface Game
extends Tickable
    A Game is the representation of an instance of a GameMode. Handles everything that is related to that GameMode: starting, stopping, Phases etc.

      • broadcastMessage

        void broadcastMessage(@Nonnull
                      net.kyori.text.Component message)
        Sends a message to every User that is related to this game. This could be a participant in the game or a spectator.
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be send
